mapper.select: SELECT DRAFT_NO ,DRAFT_TITLE ,COM_NO ,DRAFT_FLAG ,'N' KEEP_YN FROM DRAFT WHERE COM_NO = #{comNo} AND DRAFT_FLAG <= 6 UNION SELECT DRAFT_NO ,DRAFT_TITLE ,COM_NO ,DRAFT_FLAG ,KEEP_YN FROM DRAFT JOIN DRAFT_KEEP USING (DRAFT_NO) WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND KEEP_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY DRAFT_FLAG, DRAFT_NO

SELECT E.EMP_CODE ,E.EMP_ID ,T.TEAM_NM ,E.EMP_LAST_NAME || E.EMP_FIRST_NAME AS EMP_FIRST_NAME ,P."POSITION_NM" FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN TEAM T ON E.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO LEFT JOIN "POSITION" P ON E.POSITION_NO = P."POSITION_NO" WHERE E.COM_NO = #{comNo} ORDER BY T.TEAM_NO, P."LEVEL"

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT E.EMP_CODE ,E.EMP_ID ,T.TEAM_NM ,E.EMP_LAST_NAME || E.EMP_FIRST_NAME AS EMP_FIRST_NAME ,P."POSITION_NM" FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN TEAM T ON E.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO LEFT JOIN "POSITION" P ON E.POSITION_NO = P."POSITION_NO" WHERE E.COM_NO = #{comNo} ORDER BY T.TEAM_NO, P."LEVEL" ) WHERE 1=1 AND (EMP_ID LIKE '%' || #{empFirstName} || '%' OR TEAM_NM LIKE '%' || #{empFirstName} || '%' OR EMP_FIRST_NAME LIKE '%' || #{empFirstName} || '%' OR POSITION_NM LIKE '%' || #{empFirstName} || '%')

SELECT EDSM_NO ,DRAFT_NM ,EDSM_TITLE ,E.EMP_LAST_NAME || E.EMP_FIRST_NAME AS APPROVER_NAME ,P.POSITION_NM ,EDSM_FLAG ,DRAFT_FLAG ,ROW_NUM ,APPROVER_NO ,APPROVER_CODE ,REJECTED ,E.COM_NO ,E.POSITION_NO ,APPROVER_LEVEL ,APPROVE_FLAG ,EDSM_WRITE_DATE ,EDSM_DEL_FL ,Z.EMP_CODE ,EDSM_FLAG ,DRAFT_NO ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDSM_FILE WHERE EDSM_NO = #{edsmNo}) AS FILE_CNT FROM ( SELECT E.EDSM_NO ,D.DRAFT_FLAG ,DECODE(D.DRAFT_FLAG, '2', '협조문', '3', '품의서', '4', '지출결의서','5', '경조사 신청서', '6', '회의록', '기안서') AS DRAFT_NM ,E.EDSM_TITLE ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY E.EDSM_NO ORDER BY A.APPROVER_NO) AS ROW_NUM ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY E.EDSM_NO ORDER BY A.APPROVER_NO) AS APPROVER_LEVEL ,A.APPROVER_NO ,A.EMP_CODE AS APPROVER_CODE ,A.PROGRESS_FLAG ,A.APPROVE_FLAG ,A.REJECTED ,E.EDSM_WRITE_DATE ,E.EDSM_DEL_FL ,E.EMP_CODE ,E.EDSM_FLAG ,E.DRAFT_NO FROM EDSM E JOIN DRAFT D ON E.DRAFT_NO = D.DRAFT_NO JOIN APPROVER A ON (E.EDSM_NO = A.EDSM_NO AND APPROVER_FLAG = 1 AND (APPROVE_FLAG != 1 OR APPROVE_FLAG IS NULL) ) WHERE E.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND E.EDSM_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY EDSM_NO, APPROVER_NO ) Z JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON Z.APPROVER_CODE = E.EMP_CODE JOIN COMPANY C ON E.COM_NO = C.COM_NO JOIN "POSITION" P ON E.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO WHERE ROW_NUM = 1
AND DRAFT_FLAG = #{key}
AND DRAFT_FLAG IN ('1','7')
ORDER BY EDSM_NO DESC

WITH RankedApprovers1 AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY EDSM_NO ORDER BY APPROVER_NO) AS ROW_NUM, EMP_CODE, APPROVER_NO, EDSM_NO FROM APPROVER WHERE APPROVER_FLAG = 1 AND (APPROVE_FLAG != 1 OR APPROVE_FLAG IS NULL) ),
RankedApprovers2 AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY EDSM_NO ORDER BY APPROVER_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, EMP_CODE, APPROVER_NO, APPROVE_FLAG, EDSM_NO FROM APPROVER WHERE APPROVER_FLAG = 1 ),
FinalApprovers AS ( SELECT EDSM_NO, EMP_CODE FROM RankedApprovers1 WHERE ROW_NUM = 1
UNION
SELECT EDSM_NO, EMP_CODE FROM RankedApprovers2 WHERE ROW_NUM = 1 AND APPROVE_FLAG = 1 )
SELECT Z.EDSM_NO ,Z.DRAFT_NM ,Z.EDSM_TITLE ,Z.EMP_NAME ,Z.POSITION_NM ,Z.APPROVER_CODE ,EMP.EMP_LAST_NAME || EMP.EMP_FIRST_NAME AS APPROVER_NAME ,P.POSITION_NM ,Z.APPROVE_FLAG ,Z.EDSM_WRITE_DATE ,Z.EDSM_DEL_FL ,Z.EMP_CODE ,Z.EDSM_FLAG ,Z.DRAFT_NO ,Z.APPROVER_FLAG FROM ( SELECT E.EDSM_NO, DECODE(D.DRAFT_FLAG, '2', '협조문', '3', '품의서', '4', '지출결의서', '5', '경조사 신청서', '6', '회의록', '기안서') AS DRAFT_NM, E.EDSM_TITLE, EMP.EMP_LAST_NAME || EMP.EMP_FIRST_NAME AS EMP_NAME, P.POSITION_NM, ( SELECT EMP_CODE FROM FinalApprovers WHERE EDSM_NO = E.EDSM_NO ) AS APPROVER_CODE, A.APPROVE_FLAG, E.EDSM_WRITE_DATE, E.EDSM_DEL_FL, E.EMP_CODE, E.EDSM_FLAG, E.DRAFT_NO, A.APPROVER_FLAG FROM EDSM E JOIN DRAFT D ON E.DRAFT_NO = D.DRAFT_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE EMP ON E.EMP_CODE = EMP.EMP_CODE JOIN "POSITION" P ON EMP.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO JOIN APPROVER A ON E.EDSM_NO = A.EDSM_NO WHERE A.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND E.EDSM_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY E.EDSM_NO DESC ) Z JOIN EMPLOYEE EMP ON Z.APPROVER_CODE = EMP.EMP_CODE JOIN "POSITION" P ON EMP.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO

SELECT APPROVER_NO ,APPROVER_FLAG ,A.EMP_CODE ,E.EMP_LAST_NAME || E.EMP_FIRST_NAME AS APPROVER_NAME ,P.POSITION_NM ,PROGRESS_FLAG ,APPROVE_FLAG ,EDSM_NO ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY EDSM_NO ORDER BY APPROVER_NO) AS ROW_NUM FROM APPROVER A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE
JOIN "POSITION" P ON E.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO WHERE EDSM_NO = #{edsmNo} AND APPROVER_FLAG = 1 ORDER BY APPROVER_NO

SELECT NVL( LISTAGG(E.EMP_LAST_NAME || E.EMP_FIRST_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY A.APPROVER_NO), 'N') AS APPROVER_NAME FROM APPROVER A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE WHERE EDSM_NO = #{edsmNo} AND APPROVER_FLAG = 2

SELECT EDSM_NO ,EDSM_TITLE ,EDSM_CONTENT ,EDSM_WRITE_DATE ,EDSM_DEL_FL ,EMP_CODE ,EDSM_FLAG ,DRAFT_NO ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDSM_FILE WHERE EDSM_NO = #{edsmNo}) AS FILE_CNT FROM EDSM WHERE EDSM_NO = #{edsmNo}
SELECT FILE_NO ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_ORIGIN_NAME ,FILE_RENAME ,FILE_UPLOAD_DATE ,FILE_ORDER ,EDSM_NO FROM EDSM_FILE WHERE EDSM_NO = #{edsmNo}
